patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -2,9 +2,11 @@
 
 fn main() {
     // Spawn the `ganache-cli` process
     let mut child = Command::new("npx") // Use "ganache-cli" if installed globally
-        .arg("ganache-cli")             // Command to execute
+        .arg("ganache-cli")    
+        .arg("-m")                      // Mnemonic flag
+        .arg(mnemonic)                  // The actual mnemonic         // Command to execute
         .stdout(Stdio::inherit())       // Pass standard output to the parent process
         .stderr(Stdio::inherit())       // Pass standard error to the parent process
         .spawn()                        // Spawn the process
         .expect("Failed to start ganache-cli. Make sure it's installed.");

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -4,9 +4,9 @@
     let mnemonic = "prison fence hidden critic decide disease velvet tool front present dose labor";
     let ganache_path = "C:\\Users\\<YourUser>\\AppData\\Roaming\\npm\\ganache-cli.cmd";
 
     // Spawn the `ganache-cli` process
-    let mut child = Command::new("npx") // Use "ganache-cli" if installed globally
+    let mut child = Command::new(ganache_path) // Use "ganache-cli" if installed globally
         .arg("ganache-cli")    
         .arg("-m")                      // Mnemonic flag
         .arg(mnemonic)                  // The actual mnemonic         // Command to execute
         .stdout(Stdio::inherit())       // Pass standard output to the parent process
